observation: Sports Endeavors  Skip to main content About Brands Life at Sports Endeavors Careers Contact Home We help people pursue their passion for sport by delivering unrivaled service and selection, expert advice and stories of inspiration. About us Founded by Mike & Brendan in 1984, the Sports Endeavors portfolio of brands includes SOCCER.COM, WorldSoccerShop & 431 Sports Our team has over 35 years of experience outfitting youth sports teams, players, parents, coaches and fans around the world. We are proud to showcase an unrivaled selection of top-of-the-line merchandise from the world's biggest brands such as adidas, New Balance, Nike, PUMA, Under Armour and more. More About Our Brands Employee Spotlight I LOVE my co-workers! Of course, we are more like family since I started working here when I was a senior in high school. As colleagues we always support each other no matter what and we have fun doing it, but beware: there are some prank wars that still haunt me to this day!!! :-D We did a team-building event at Camp Chestnut Lake and, boy, did we have a great time! The team bonding was so fun, and we discovered new ways to work and connect with our co-workers, which was the best part. It is awesome to be a part of the Sports Endeavors family. - Bianca / Team Sales Join our Team Visit Us On LinkedIn Cookie Policy © 2023 Sports Endeavors, LLC

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain sportsendeavors.com is indeed registered and has been since 1999. The registrant information is protected by a privacy service, which is not unusual for businesses. The domain is also registered with Tucows, a reputable domain registrar, and the status codes indicate that the domain is not set for transfer or update, which adds to its legitimacy. There are no signs of recent domain registration or frequent changes that could suggest a scam. Based on the LinkedIn presence, the content of the website, and the WHOIS information, there are no immediate red flags that would suggest this is a scam website. The company has a long-standing domain registration and a substantial presence on LinkedIn, which indicates that it is a legitimate business. I now know the final answer. The URL https://www.sportsendeavors.com/ does not appear to be a scam website.

observation.reason: The website has a long-standing domain registration since 1999 a substantial presence on LinkedIn no unrealistic claims and the content seems to be related to a legitimate company. WHOIS information matches the profile of a legitimate and established business.
